PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DuctSilencerTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Duct silencer type common attributes.\X\0D InsertionLoss and RegeneratedSound attributes deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcSoundProperties instead.

PropertyDef.Name: AirFlowrateRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Possible range of airflow that can be delivered.

PropertyDef.Name: HasExteriorInsulation
PropertyDef.Definition: TRUE if the silencer has exterior insulation. FALSE if it does not.

PropertyDef.Name: Length
PropertyDef.Definition: The finished length of the silencer.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), provided, if there is no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: WorkingPressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable minimum and maximum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).
